title: 后台报错MEK 求解决方案
author: 4513sdad13215
txt_content: 01.09 11:05:55 [服务器] 严重错误 An error occured while connecting to URL 'https://dl.dropbox.com/u/90411166/Donators/Mekanism.txt.'01.09 11:04:55 [服务器] 严重错误 An error occured while connecting to URL 'https://dl.dropbox.com/u/90411166/Mod%20Versions/Mekanism.txt.'

replies.author: 向文
replies.txt_content: 这个是他要更新时连不上更新服务器 把他的配置文件中自动更新关掉就可以了 这个报错不影响体验
